entry.title: Maudlin
entry.summary:
Author: PutYourRecordsOn

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,004Chapters: 5/35Kudos: 15

Summary: (can be read without knowledge of Mission impossible or Batman only requires understanding of one)Before he was the IMF‚Äôs favorite tech guy, Benji Dunn was something else entirely‚Äîa medic for the League of Assassins, a reluctant part of their world, and somehow the only non-assassin adult Damian Wayne trusted. He never meant to care. He never meant to stay. And he definitely never meant to walk away from it all broken.Years later, the past doesn‚Äôt just catch up‚Äîit breaks the door down. With the Entity threatening the future, Damian and Jason back in his orbit, and Ethan Hunt watching him like he sees every secret Benji‚Äôs tried to bury, the life Benji built is starting to crack.A story of found family, sharp edges, and soft hearts. Of missions and mistakes, art and tea, and what it means to choose kindness in a world that asks you to kill.

entry.title: Inheritance of Shadows
entry.summary:
Author: Pistolbag

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,130Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 70

Summary: In Gotham‚Äôs grim streets, there‚Äôs always a new face: an old ghost in a new skin. But when a young girl, feral and untrained, is discovered in a dark corner of Gotham's underground by Batman and Robin during a mission to stop David Cain, the dynamic of the Bat-Family is forever changed.

entry.title: The Hundred Day Curse
entry.summary:
Author: SolaceInSpace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 119,062Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 3,126

Summary: Gotham was literally cursed but no one believed Bruce. He took it upon himself to fix it and after decades of searching, that solution came to him in the form of a little blue vial. Bruce was to take the curse within himself to temper it into something manageable.He thinks the others would call him stupid and stop him if they knew about this, but (un)fortunately for Bruce, his family hasn't spoken to him for forever. There was no one here to stop him.He downed the liquid and woke up as his nine-year-old self.Ch3 Excerpt:‚ÄúMother, do you remember those funny clouds above people‚Äôs heads I told you about? Well, I‚Äôm doing something about them but the process is very lonely. Or not. I think it‚Äôs just me. I‚Äôm the problem. I can‚Äôt seem to get people to like me enough to stay. I know‚Äì-‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm aware that it‚Äôs due to my own shortcomings but sometimes, it feels like even the worst monsters have people that love them and yet I have no one.‚ÄùBruce let out a humourless chuckle and rested his forehead on his knees.‚ÄúI just wish there was someone that cared about me.‚Äù

entry.title: The Gritty Wisdom of Jason Todd (Also known as: Jason Todd's Post-Wisdom Teeth Anesthetic Revelations)
entry.summary:
Author: Mia_Da_Cat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,035Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 68

Summary: Fresh from wisdom teeth extraction, a heavily medicated Jason Todd has achieved peak existential clarity: He is the true Batman. Bruce? Just his well-meaning 'PR rep' for the superficial stuff. The Batfamily is trying (and failing) to keep a straight face, recording every side-splitting philosophical deep dive into what really makes a grim vigilante. Poor Duke is going to be so disappointed he missed this.

entry.title: Loss Fear
entry.summary:
Author: PSKarmel

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,460Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 10

Summary: "The most common feeling in the world is loss. Everyone has lost something. Toys, money, clothes. People. Bruce didn't like the feeling of loss, but he couldn't shake it. The world seemed to want to take everything he held most dear. But Bruce learned to protect his things and keep them safe. [...]"The mansion was invaded by strange creatures and Bruce finds himself at a loss as he tries to protect his children. But despite his fear, he doesn't back down, he fights.

They start getting help requests from the U.N.Bruce and Clark are married and starting a family right under the noses of the whole League in secret until they are found to have children during an ‚Äúemergency meeting‚Äù.Bruce doesn‚Äôt trust the rest of the League as far as he can throw them and it shows but he doesn‚Äôt care.They acquire many children almost all at once, there is a highly skeptical case worker who has beef with Batman near the end, and the beef with Lex Luthor grows.Or Bruce and Clark adopt and acquire all seven of their children within two years of their marriage and it causes stress, miscommunication and issues with the Justice League.
